Team Stats Section.Layout: Single-column layout with a central block of text followed by a grid of statistical highlights.
Team Stats Section.Design: Clean, professional look with a centralized heading and description text transitioning into a stat grid. The stats are displayed against a highlighted background, making them stand out.

Key Elements.Heading and Description: Centrally aligned, providing an overview and context.
Key Elements.Stat Grid: Four-column grid showcasing key metrics, each with a bold numerical value and descriptive label.
Key Elements.Highlighted Background: Background color for the stat grid to create contrast and draw attention.

Team Stats Section.Use Cases: Ideal for showcasing team achievements, company milestones, or any quantifiable metrics in a corporate or professional setting.
